task.title: Transforming DITA to Word with Java command

step.cmd: On the command line, enter the command java -jar lib\dost.jar /i:<input> /outdir:<out> /transtype:wordrtf.
step.info: <input> means the name of ditamap file to be transformed, and <out> means the output directory.

step.cmd: After processing and generating, a single output file in .rft format occurs in the specified directory, such as in e:/output/diat2word..
You can use Microsoft Word to open the output file.
You can also further edit the output file by using tools in Microsoft Word.
